title: Foxbat and the Mimi
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and John Skibinski
brief_description: A storm forces a flying fox to take shelter in a cave, something he regrets when cave spirits attempt to capture him. A film by John Skibinski. Also available as a compilation with “The Huge adventures of Trevor the cat”.
creator_credit_for_label: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and John Skibinski
